comments:
Steps:
1.Suppose another user has updated a CP. Make sure that same CP's editor is opened by you on a different m/c.
2.Now with out closing the CP's editor synchronise your library.
3.There is error that says check the logs. But the CP editor is updated with the changes made by another user.
Following part of log:
MESSAGE An unexpected exception was thrown.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.epf.authoring.ui.properties.TNGPropertySheetPage.selectionChanged(TNGPropertySheetPage.java:114)
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.properties.PropertySheet.selectionChanged(PropertySheet.java:218)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.AbstractSelectionService.fireSelection(AbstractSelectionService.java:156)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.AbstractSelectionService$1.selectionChanged(AbstractSelectionService.java:62)
	at
Handled null pointer. Should be fixed in any build after 01/06/2006
This problem is fixed on epf-composer-1.0-M5-N20060818-1730 build.
closed it as verified by QA.
